I'm not a medical professional, but the force needed to set a dislocated wrist back in place varies significantly based on the individual's anatomy, the type and severity of the dislocation, and other factors. Typically, this procedure should only be performed by a trained healthcare provider to avoid causing further injury.

If you need assistance with a dislocated wrist, please seek immediate medical attention. Attempting to reduce a dislocation without proper training and equipment can be dangerous.
